attributes.action: Drop plans to send refugees to Rwanda
attributes.background: The government have announced plans to send refugees, who have a right under international law to claim asylum in the UK, to Rwanda to claim asylum there. This contravenes our international obligations and is inhumane. The government should drop these plans.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
